name: SpatialWorld
description:
Decentralized ecosystem for trading, interacting, and visualizing physical farm space in the metaverse.

VR version coming Feb'22

Mobile version coming Mar'22

Instructions:

For the best experience, make the app fullscreen.

To move, use WASD. To rotate your camera, drag the right mouse button.

Maximum players in room: 20

Compatible with Firefox and Chrome

Things to do:

Walk through portals to explore different worlds.

Click on the greenhouse in the Farming Community to connect your crypto wallet and see info/buy NFT.

Build your own community in the WorldBuilding portal. 

  • Select the object you want to place
  • Use the mouse wheel to rotate the object
  • Left click to place an object
  • Shift + Right Click to delete an object

Explore the SpatialGrowRoom to see a digital twin of our current farm. You can click on the hub and dispense some solution using the controls.

Invite your friends to play and chat.

Solutions to common issues:

Using a mouse is recommended.

If your game is blurry, check/uncheck the green 'DynamicResolutionSystem' box in the top left corner of the screen.
